author: n3tsurge
description: This capability involves establishing the ability to block internal IP addresses that are deemed malicious or pose a threat to the organization's network. This includes configuring firewalls, intrusion prevention systems, and other security appliances to effectively block traffic from these internal IP addresses. It is essential for preventing unauthorized access and mitigating potential attacks from within the organization.

requirements.description: Staff must be trained and qualified to perform this capability effectively.
Documented procedures and playbooks must be available for executing this capability.
Network monitoring tools and access to network infrastructure for analysis and control.

title: Establish Ability to Block Internal IP Addresses

references.name: IP Address Blocking and Threat Intelligence Integration
CISA Advisory: DarkSide Ransomware - IP Blocking Strategies
MITRE ATT&CK: Proxy - Connection Proxy Detection and Mitigation
